Broken Deity.card_desc: [Guardian Spirit] Increase Luna's deploy range by {scale=20|20}%.

Crescent.card_desc: [Lunar Leap] Dropping below {scale=15|15}% of your max health reduces the cooldown of Lunar Leap by 100%.

Full Moon.card_desc: [Lunar Leap] Gain a {scale=100|100} health shield for 3s when you use Lunar Leap.

Goddess' Blessing.card_desc: [Moonlight] Allies being healed by Moonlight gain 25% damage reduction.

Half Moon.card_desc: [Lunar Leap] Reduce Lunar Leap's cooldown by {scale=0.6|0.6}s.

Life Link.card_desc: [Guardian Spirit] Luna now heals allies around her for 300 health per second.

Lunar Connection.card_desc: [Guardian Spirit] Reduce the cooldown of Luna's initial deploy by {scale=1.2|1.2}s.

Moonlight Garden.card_desc: [Armor] Hits with Light Bow restore {scale=2|2}% Moonlight.

Moonwalk.card_desc: [Armor] Lower your gravity and increase your air control by {scale=50|10}% while using Moonlight.

Protectors.card_desc: [Guardian Spirit] Luna restores {scale=2|2}% Moonlight every 1s in a 30 foot range.

Restored Faith.card_desc: [Moonlight] Healing with Moonlight heals Io for {scale=10|10} health.

Sacrifice.card_desc: [Guardian Spirit] If Io falls below 200 health while Luna is active, she trades places with Luna, heals, and Luna dies in her stead.

Sanctum of Faith.card_desc: [Moonlight] Regenerate {scale=1|1}% Moonlight every 1s when not using Moonlight.

Sky Walker.card_desc: [Armor] Lower your gravity and increase your air control by {scale=50|10}% while firing your Light Bow.

Spirit Arrows.card_desc: [Moonlight] Healing with Moonlight reduces the cooldown of Luna's redeploy by {scale=0.1|0.1}s.

Swift Arrows.card_desc: [Moonlight] Allies gain {scale=8|8}% Movement Speed while being healed by Moonlight.

Animalische St\u00e4rke.card_desc: [Guardian Spirit] Erhöht Lunas maximale Gesundheit um {scale=200|200} LP.

Besch\u00fctzer.card_desc: [Guardian Spirit] Luna regeneriert auf bis zu 30 Einheiten Entfernung pro Sekunde {scale=2|2}% Mondlicht.

Erneuerter Glaube.card_desc: [Moonlight] Heilst du Verbündete mit Mondlicht, wirst du {scale=10|10} LP geheilt.

Ewigkeitsreliquiar.card_desc: [Lunar Leap] Die Aktivierung von Mondsprung erzeugt {scale=2|2} Munition.

Flinke Pfeile.card_desc: [Moonlight] Erhöht das Lauftempo von Verbündeten um {scale=8|8}%, während sie mit Mondlicht geheilt werden.

Geisterpfeile.card_desc: [Moonlight] Heilst du Verbündete mit Mondlicht, reduziert sich die Abklingzeit für Lunas erneuten Einsatz um {scale=0.1|0.1}s.

Glaubensheiligtum.card_desc: [Moonlight] Regeneriert pro Sekunde {scale=1|1}% Mondlicht, solange Mondlicht nicht aktiv ist.

Halbmond.card_desc: [Lunar Leap] Reduziert die Abklingzeit von Mondsprung um {scale=0.6|0.6}s.

Himmelsgestirn.card_desc: [Rüstung] Erhöht deine maximale Gesundheit um {scale=50|50} LP.

Himmelsl\u00e4ufer.card_desc: [Rüstung] Reduziert die Erdanziehung und erhöht die Luftkontrolle um {scale=50|10}%, während du deinen Lichtbogen abfeuerst.

Lebensbund.card_desc: [Guardian Spirit] Luna heilt nahe Verbündete nun 300 LP pro Sekunde.

Lunare Verbindung.card_desc: [Guardian Spirit] Reduziert die für Lunas Ersteinsatz benötigte Zeit um {scale=1.2|1.2}s.

Mondlichtgarten.card_desc: [Rüstung] Treffer mit dem Lichtbogen erzeugen {scale=2|2}% Mondlicht.

Mondsichel.card_desc: [Lunar Leap] Fällst du unter {scale=15|15}% deiner maximalen Gesundheit, wird die Abklingzeit von Mondsprung um 100% reduziert.

Mondspaziergang.card_desc: [Rüstung] Reduziert die Erdanziehung und erhöht die Luftkontrolle um {scale=50|10}% während der Verwendung von Mondlicht.

Opfergabe.card_desc: [Guardian Spirit] Fällt deine Gesundheit unter 200 LP, während Luna aktiv ist, tauscht ihr die Position und du wirst vollständig geheilt, während Luna an deiner Stelle stirbt.

Segen der G\u00f6ttin.card_desc: [Mondlicht] Verbündete erleiden 25% weniger Schaden, während sie von Mondlicht geheilt werden.

Vollmond.card_desc: [Lunar Leap] Bei Aktivierung von Mondsprung erhältst du 3s lang einen Schild mit {scale=100|100} LP.

B\u00e9n\u00e9diction de la d\u00e9esse.card_desc: [Clair de lune] Les alliés soignés par Clair de lune subissent 25% de dégâts en moins.

Connexion lunaire.card_desc: [Guardian Spirit] L'invocation de Luna se recharge {scale=1.2|1.2}s plus vite.

Courroux f\u00e9roce.card_desc: [Guardian Spirit] Luna a {scale=200|200} PV de plus.

Croissant.card_desc: [Saut sélène] Passer en-dessous de {scale=15|15}% de PV réinitialise le temps de recharge de Saut sélène.

D\u00e9esse d\u00e9chue.card_desc: [Guardian Spirit] La portée d'invocation de Luna augmente de {scale=20|20}%.

Demi-lune.card_desc: [Saut sélène] Saut sélène se recharge {scale=0.6|0.6}s plus vite.

Fl\u00e8ches spirituelles.card_desc: [Clair de lune] Les soins de Clair de lune réduisent de {scale=0.1|0.1}s le temps de recharge de l’invocation de Luna.

Fl\u00e8ches v\u00e9loces.card_desc: [Clair de lune] Clair de lune augmente de {scale=8|8}% la vitesse des alliés soignés.

Jardin lunaire.card_desc: [Armure] Les tirs réussis redonnent {scale=2|2}% de clair de lune.

Lien vital.card_desc: [Guardian Spirit] Luna rend 300 PV par seconde aux alliés proches.

Marcher sur la lune.card_desc: [Armure] Clair de lune diminue votre gravité de {scale=50|10}% et augmente votre contrôle aérien d'autant.

Pleine lune.card_desc: [Saut sélène] Saut sélène donne un bouclier de {scale=100|100} PV pendant 3s.

Promenade stellaire.card_desc: [Armure] Utiliser l'Arc de lumière diminue votre gravité de {scale=50|10}% et augmente votre contrôle aérien d'autant.

Protecteurs.card_desc: [Guardian Spirit] À moins de 30 unités de vous, Luna redonne {scale=2|2}% de Clair de lune par seconde.

Restauration de foi.card_desc: [Clair de lune] Les soins de Clair de lune vous redonnent {scale=10|10} PV.

Sacrifice.card_desc: [Guardian Spirit] Passer en-dessous de 200 PV alors que Luna est active vous soigne et vous fait changer de place avec elle, puis elle meurt.

Sanctuaire sacr\u00e9.card_desc: [Clair de lune] Vous regagnez {scale=1|1}% de Clair de lune chaque seconde tant que vous ne l'utilisez pas.

IoCardArmor3.card_desc: [Armor] Lower your gravity by {scale=5|5}% while firing your Light Bow.

IoCardArmor4.card_desc: [Armor] NOT FUNCTIONAL YET - Hits with Light Bow restore {1|1}% Moonlight.

IoCardF2.card_desc: [Lunar Leap] Increase the strength of your F by {scale=5|5}%.

IoCardF3.card_desc: [Lunar Leap] Gain a {scale=100|100} shield when you use F.

IoCardQ1.card_desc: [Guardian Spirit] NOT FUNCTIONAL YET - Reduce the cooldown of Rush (12s) by {scale=0.6|0.6}s.

IoCardQ2.card_desc: [Guardian Spirit] Increase your Spirits deploy range by {scale=10|10}%.

IoCardQ3.card_desc: [Guardian Spirit] NOT FUNCTIONAL YET - Your Guardian Fox restores {scale=1|1}% Moonlight every 1s.

IoCardQ4.card_desc: [Guardian Spirit] NOT FUNCTIONAL YET - Reduce the cooldown of your Guardian Spirit deploy and redeploy by {scale=8|8}%.

IoCardRMB1.card_desc: [Moonlight] NOT FUNCTIONAL YET - Generate {scale=1|1}% Moonlight every 2s.

IoCardRMB2.card_desc: [Moonlight] Successful hits heal Io for {scale=20|20} health.

IoCardRMB3.card_desc: [Moonlight] Successful hits reduce the cooldown of Guardian Spirit by {0.1|0.1}s.

IoCardRMB4.card_desc: [Moonlight] Allies gain {scale=3|3}% Movement Speed for 3s after being healed by RMB.

Bendici\u00f3n de la diosa.card_desc: [Luz de luna] Los aliados curados por Luz de luna ganan un 25% de reducción de daño.

Caminante del cielo.card_desc: [Armadura] Reduce tu gravedad y aumenta tu control en el aire un {scale=50|10}% mientras disparas tu Arco de luz.

Conexi\u00f3n lunar.card_desc: [Guardian Spirit] Reduce la recarga del despliegue inicial de Luna en {scale=1.2|1.2}s.

Creciente.card_desc: [Lunar Leap] Si tu salud máxima está por debajo del {scale=15|15}%, reduces un 100% la recarga de Salto lunar.

Deidad rota.card_desc: [Guardian Spirit] Aumenta el rango de despliegue de Luna un {scale=20|20}%.

Fe restaurada.card_desc: [BDM] Curar con Luz de luna hace que te cures {scale=10|10} PS.

Flechas espirituales.card_desc: [BDM] Curar con Luz de luna reduce la recarga del despliegue de Luna en {scale=0.1|0.1}s.

Flechas veloces.card_desc: [BDM] Los aliados obtienen {scale=8|8}% de velocidad de movimiento tras ser curados por Luz de luna.

Jard\u00edn de luz de luna.card_desc: [Armadura] Los disparos de Arco de luz restauran un {scale=2|2}% de Luz de luna.

Luna llena.card_desc: [Lunar Leap] Obtienes {scale=100|100} escudo de salud durante 3s cuando usas Salto lunar.

Media luna.card_desc: [Lunar Leap] Reduce la recarga de Salto lunar en {scale=0.6|0.6}s.

Paso lunar.card_desc: [Armadura] Reduce tu gravedad y aumenta tu control en el aire un {scale=50|10}% al usar Luz de luna.

Protectores.card_desc: [Guardian Spirit] Luna restaura un {scale=2|2}% de Luz de luna a cada segundo en un alcance de 30 unidades.

Relicario eterno.card_desc: [Lunar Leap] Salto lunar recarga {scale=2|2} de munición.

Sacrificio.card_desc: [Guardian Spirit] Si la salud de Io baja de 200 PS con Luna activada, Io intercambiará su posición con Luna, se curará y Luna morirá en su lugar.

Santuario de fe.card_desc: [BDM] Regeneras un {scale=1|1}% de Luz de luna a cada segundo que no uses dicha habilidad.

V\u00ednculo vital.card_desc: [Guardian Spirit] Luna cura ahora a los aliados a su alrededor 300 PS por segundo.

Andarilha do C\u00e9u.card_desc: [Armadura] Diminui sua gravidade e aumenta seu controle aéreo em {scale=50|10}% enquanto está disparando o Arco de Luz.

B\u00ean\u00e7\u00e3o da Deusa.card_desc: [Luz da Lua] Aliados que estão sendo curados pela Luz da Lua ganham 25% de redução do dano que receberem.

Caminhante da Lua.card_desc: [Armadura] Diminui sua gravidade e aumenta seu controle aéreo em {scale=50|10}% enquanto usa a Luz da Lua.

Conex\u00e3o Lunar.card_desc: [Guardian Spirit] Reduz o intervalo da colocação inicial de Luna em {scale=1.2|1.2}s.

Divindade Quebrada.card_desc: [Guardian Spirit] O alcance no qual Luna pode ser colocada aumenta em {scale=20|20}%.

Elo da Vida.card_desc: [Guardian Spirit] Luna agora cura os aliados em volta em 300 de vida por segundo.

F\u00e9 Restaurada.card_desc: [Luz da Lua] Curar aliados com Luz da Lua cura Io em {scale=10|10} de vida.

Flecha Espiritual.card_desc: [Moonlight] Curar com Luz da Lua reduz em {scale=0.1|0.1}s o intervalo necessário para recolocar Luna.

Flechas Velocistas.card_desc: [Luz da Lua] Aliados recebem {scale=8|8}% mais velocidade de movimento por 3s ao serem curados pela Luz da Lua.

Jardim da Lua.card_desc: [Armadura] Acertar inimigos com o Arco de Luz restaura {scale=2|2}% de Luz da Lua.

Lua Cheia.card_desc: [Salto Lunar] Ganha um escudo com {scale=100|100} de vida por 3s ao usar Salto Lunar.

Lua Crescente.card_desc: [Salto Lunar] Chegar abaixo de {scale=15|15}% da sua vida máxima reduz o intervalo do Salto Lunar em 100%.

Meia Lua.card_desc: [Salto Lunar] O intervalo do Salto Lunar é reduzido em {scale=0.6|0.6}s.

Protetores.card_desc: [Guardian Spirit] Luna restaura {scale=2|2}% de Luz da Lua a cada segundo dentro de 9m.

Relic\u00e1rio Eterno.card_desc: [Salto Lunar] Salto Lunar restaura {scale=2|2} de munição.

Sacrif\u00edcio.card_desc: [Guardian Spirit] Se Io chegar abaixo de 200 de vida quando Luna estiver ativa, ela troca de lugar com Luna e se cura, e Luna morre em seu lugar.

Santu\u00e1rio da F\u00e9.card_desc: [Luz da Lua] Regenera {scale=1|1}% de Luz da Lua por segundo quando ela não está sendo usada.

\u0411\u043b\u0430\u0433\u043e\u0441\u04.card_desc: [Лунный свет] Союзники получают на 25% меньше урона во время исцеления Лунным светом.

\u0411\u044b\u0441\u0442\u0440\u044b\u04.card_desc: [ПКМ] Скорость союзников увеличивается на {scale=8|8}% во время исцеления Лунным светом.

\u0416\u0435\u0440\u0442\u0432\u0430.card_desc: [Guardian Spirit] Если здоровье Ио падает ниже 200 ед., пока активна Луна, она меняется местами с лисой, и та умирает вместо нее.

\u0417\u0430\u0449\u0438\u0442\u043d\u04.card_desc: [Guardian Spirit] Луна восстанавливает {scale=2|2}% Лунного света в секунду в радиусе 30 м.

\u0418\u0434\u0443\u0449\u0430\u044f \u0.card_desc: [Броня] Сила гравитации уменьшается на {scale=50|10}% во время стрельбы из Светового лука.

\u041b\u0443\u043d\u043d\u0430\u044f \u0.card_desc: [Броня] Сила гравитации уменьшается на {scale=50|10}% во время действия Лунного света.
[Guardian Spirit] Перезарядка первого призыва Луны сокращается на {scale=1.2|1.2} с.

\u041b\u0443\u043d\u043d\u044b\u0439 \u0.card_desc: [Броня] Попадания из Светового лука восстанавливают {scale=2|2}% Лунного света.

\u041c\u0435\u0441\u044f\u0446.card_desc: [Lunar Leap] При уровне здоровья ниже {scale=15|15}% от максимального перезарядка Лунного прыжка сокращается на 100%.

\u041e\u0431\u0440\u0435\u0442\u0435\u04.card_desc: [ПКМ] Исцеление Лунным светом исцеляют вас на {scale=10|10} ед.

\u041f\u043e\u043b\u043d\u043e\u043b\u04.card_desc: [Lunar Leap] При использовании Лунного прыжка вы получаете щит прочностью {scale=100|100} ед. на 3 с.

\u041f\u043e\u043b\u0443\u043c\u0435\u04.card_desc: [Lunar Leap] Перезарядка Лунного прыжка сокращается на {scale=0.6|0.6} с.

\u0421\u0432\u044f\u0437\u0430\u043d\u04.card_desc: [Guardian Spirit] Луна исцеляет союзников вокруг на 300 ед. в секунду.

\u0421\u0432\u044f\u0442\u0438\u043b\u04.card_desc: [ПКМ] Вы генерируете {scale=1|1}% Лунного света в секунду, когда он не используется.

\u0421\u043b\u043e\u043c\u043b\u0435\u04.card_desc: [Guardian Spirit] Дальность размещения Луны увеличивается на {scale=20|20}%.

\u0421\u0442\u0440\u0435\u043b\u044b \u0.card_desc: [ПКМ] Исцеление Лунным светом сокращает перезарядку лисы на {scale=0.1|0.1} с.

B\u0142ogos\u0142awie\u0144stwo bogini.card_desc: [Światło Księżyca] Sojusznicy leczeni Światłem Księżyca zyskują 25% redukcji obrażeń.

Chy\u017ce strza\u0142y.card_desc: [PPM] Sojusznicy leczeni Światłem Księżyca otrzymują {scale=8|8}% szybkości ruchu.

Ksi\u0119\u017cycowe po\u0142\u0105czeni.card_desc: [Guardian Spirit] Skraca czas odnowienia pierwszego przywołania Luny o {scale=1.2|1.2} s.

Ksi\u0119\u017cycowy ch\u00f3d.card_desc: [Pancerz] Zmniejsza twoje opadanie oraz zwiększa kontrolę lotu o {scale=50|10}% podczas korzystania ze Światła Księżyca.

Niebia\u0144ski piechur.card_desc: [Pancerz] Zmniejsza twoje opadanie o {scale=50|10}% i zwiększa kontrolę nad lotem podczas strzelania z Łuku

Obro\u0144cy.card_desc: [Guardian Spirit] Luna przywraca {scale=2|2}% Światła Księżyca co 1 s w promieniu 30 jedn.

Ogniwo \u017cycia.card_desc: [Guardian Spirit] Luna przywraca teraz okolicznym sojusznikom 300 PZ na sekundę.

Pe\u0142nia.card_desc: [Lunar Leap] Aktywuje tarczę o {scale=100|100} pkt. wytrzymałości na 3 s podczas korzystania z Księżycowego skoku.

P\u00f3\u0142ksi\u0119\u017cyc.card_desc: [Lunar Leap] Skraca czas odnowienia Księżycowego skoku o {scale=0.6|0.6} s.

Po\u015bwi\u0119cenie.card_desc: [Guardian Spirit] Jeśli zdrowie Io spadnie poniżej 200 PZ, podczas gdy Luna jest aktywna, zamienia się z nią miejscami, leczy się, a Luna umiera zamiast niej.

Przywr\u00f3cona wiara.card_desc: [PPM] Leczenie Światłem Księżyca przywraca Io {scale=10|10} PZ.

Rozbita bosko\u015b\u0107.card_desc: [Guardian Spirit] Zwiększa zasięg przywołania Luny o {scale=20|20}%.

Sanktuarium wiary.card_desc: [PPM] Przywraca {scale=1|1}% Światła Księżyca co 1 s, kiedy nie używasz Światła Księżyca.

Sierp Ksi\u0119\u017cyca.card_desc: [Lunar Leap] Spadek poniżej {scale=15|15}% maks. PZ skraca czas odnowienia Księżycowego skoku o 100%.

Strza\u0142y duszy.card_desc: [PPM] Leczenie Światłem Księżyca skraca czas odnowienia przywołania Luny o {scale=0.1|0.1} s.

Wieczny relikwiarz.card_desc: [Lunar Leap] Księżycowy skok przywraca {scale=2|2} szt. amunicji.

Ay Ba\u011flant\u0131s\u0131.card_desc: [Guardian Spirit] Luna'nın ilk konuşlanmasının Bekleme Süresini {scale=1.2|1.2}sn azalt.

Ay I\u015f\u0131\u011f\u0131 Bah\u00e7es.card_desc: [Zırh] Hafif Yay vuruşları Ay Işığı'nı %{scale=2|2} yeniler.

Ay Y\u00fcr\u00fcy\u00fc\u015f\u00fc.card_desc: [Zırh] Ay Işığı ile ateş ederken yer çekimini düşür ve hava kontrolünü %{scale=50|10} artır.

Dolunay.card_desc: [Lunar Leap] Ay Sıçrayışı kullanırken 3sn boyunca {scale=100|100} Canlık bir Kalkan kazan.

G\u00f6kte Gezen.card_desc: [Zırh] Hafif Yay ile ateş ederken yer çekimini düşür ve hava kontrolünü %{scale=50|10} artır.

Hayat Ba\u011flant\u0131s\u0131.card_desc: [Guardian Spirit] Luna, etrafındaki müttefikleri saniyede 300 Can iyileştirir.

Hilal.card_desc: [Lunar Leap] Maksimum canın %{scale=15|15} altına düşerse Ay Sıçrayışı'nın Bekleme Süresi %100 azalır.

\u0130nan\u00e7 \u0130adesi.card_desc: [Moonlight] Ay Işığı ile iyileştirmek Io'yu {scale=10|10} Can iyileştirir.

\u0130nan\u00e7 Merkezi.card_desc: [Moonlight] Ay Işığı kullanmazken her 1 saniyede %{scale=1|1} Ay Işığı doldur.

Koruyucular.card_desc: [Guardian Spirit] Luna, 30 birimlik menzilde her 1 saniyede %{scale=2|2} Ay Işığı yeniler.

\u00d6zveri.card_desc: [Guardian Spirit] Luna etkinken Io 200 canın altına düşerse Luna ile yer değiştirir ve Io yerine Luna ölür.

Ruh Oklar\u0131.card_desc: [Moonlight] Ay Işığı ile iyileştirmek Luna'nın Bekleme Süresini {scale=0.1|0.1}sn azaltır.

Seri Oklar.card_desc: [SAĞFARE] Müttefikler, Ay Işığı ile iyileştirilirken %{scale=8|8} Hareket Hızı kazanır.

Tanr\u0131\u00e7an\u0131n Kutsamas\u0131.card_desc: [Ay Işığı] Ay Işığı ile iyileştirilen müttefikler %25 hasar azaltma kazanırlar.

Yar\u0131m Ay.card_desc: [Lunar Leap] Ay Sıçrayışı'nın Bekleme Süresini {scale=0.6|0.6}sn azalt.
